body: ```suggestion For example, if the resource is a representation of a DID document with media type application/did, then ```

```suggestion In accordance with [[RFC3986]], it consists of the following three steps: resolving the DID; dereferencing the resource; and dereferencing the fragment (only if the input DID URL contains a DID fragment):

```

just human-facing whitespace ```suggestion DID parameters of the input DID URL MUST be passed as resolution options to the DID Resolution algorithm. If the input DID does not exist, return a null result. Otherwise, the result is called the resolved DID document. ```
